footer.currentlyUsing: Currently used by {users} users on {guilds} discord servers

error.title: Astatine - Not Found
error.url: The requested URL {url} was not found on this server.

main.title: A Simple Discord Global Ban
main.desc: Use Astatine to keep out unwanted discord members. These include people sending token grabbers, ip grabbers and people doing things with malicious intents.

secondary.desc: You can use our service completely for free. Choose an option below to start.

discord.title: Add to Discord
discord.desc: For us to be able to ban unwanted users, we need a discord bot on your server. Press the button below, to invite our discord bot, to your server!

dashboard.title: Open Dashboard
dashboard.desc: Open the dashboard, and have a look. You might find something interesting.

report.title: Astatine - Report User
report.tos: All submitted evidence and information is correct and not edited in any way.
report.reportSent: Your report was sent! Thank you.
